feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:45 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -12.4°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -14.2°C
Wind: N 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 01:35 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries or snow squalls. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 01:35 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 01:35 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
